title: Visual Commonsense Knowledge

definitions.VisualCOMET: Cognitive Image Understanding via Visual Commonsense Graphs

summary: The slide presents the concept of VisualCOMET, which stands for Cognitive Image Understanding via Visual Commonsense Graphs. It explains how VisualCOMET can be used to understand the dynamic context of a still image by analyzing the actions and intentions of the people depicted in the image. The slide includes a diagram that illustrates the reasoning process behind the actions of individuals in a water rescue scenario, using a combination of commonsense knowledge and visual cues.
